properties.title: Conny Land leisure park
properties.abstract: Conny Land is the largest theme park in Switzerland and has been delighting guests of all ages since 1983.
properties.description:
Conny Land is famous for its legendary sea lion and parrot shows, but also brand new rides such as the catapult tower "Mega Shooter", the largest linear roller coaster in Europe "Cobra" or the smallest roller coaster in the world "Cobralino" ensuring that every age group gets their moneys worth.

When it rains, various indoor activities provide an adrenalin rush, such as the "Jungle Adventure" climbing garden with various attractions.

So much adventure makes you hungry. There is a self service restaurant as well as a pizzeria. On hot days the Space Cafe offers a cold drink. In the Ch√¢teau, Conny Land also offers a location for company events.
properties.name: CONNY-LAND
